website_summaries.verdict: Fairly inexpensive, portable and ability to treat with hot or cold steam is unique.
pros: Unique approach in that hot or cool steam can be used for treatments
Also a humidifier that can be used for aromatherapy

customer_reviews.title: Great facial steamer at an Amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price & I really love that there is a hot & cold option (cold is especially great for hot summer days). Another great feature is the steamer lights up green around tank (to show that it's plugged in) also hot/cold buttons light up when on. This steamer says you can use Essential Oils but directions do not have any info how to use EO with steamer. I have not put any EO in my facial steamer as I am worried about the oils breaking down the plastic. All in all this is a sturdy product with great price. Hope this last me for years.
